review: Home Stay Punjabi Handi was good hotel for comfortable stay. Staff was professional and friendly. Room was spacious and cleaned with all basic amenities. Very near to main market and shopping area. Hot water available bathroom for 24 hrs. It was comfortable stay.
name: MHP91

review: The SIDCUL industrial area is a stone's throw from this hotel and all daily amenities- market,busstand, mall etc . are very conveniently located. You will never feel bored at this hotel. The food is awesome especially in winters.   I recommend this as a good hotel for short business stays.
name: Sureka S
